spark plugs 22-29 lb ft
Flywheel gland nut 220 ft lbs not T4
Fan nut & generator pulley nut 44 ft lbs
Crankshaft pulley T1, T2, T3 32-36 ft lbs, T4 44 ft lbs
Oil drain plug 25 ft lbs, T4 16 ft lbs
Clutch mounting bolts 18 ft lbs
steering arm bolt - beam centre pin = 47 to 54 ft. lbs. or 65-75 Nm
